Interface SpatialChunkConsumer

All Known Subinterfaces:
SpatialChunkRenderer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSpatialLayer, Candlestick3DRenderer, DepthAwareBatchConsumer, LineSpatialRenderer, SmithChartRenderer, SpatialPathBatchBuilder, TernaryPlotRenderer, VoxelCloudRenderer
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface SpatialChunkConsumer
Consumer for spatial buffer chunks.
Since:
1.7.0

    accept(SpatialBuffer buffer, int pointCount)

  • Method Details

    • accept

      void accept(SpatialBuffer buffer, int pointCount)
      Processes a filled spatial buffer.
      Parameters:
      buffer - spatial buffer containing input/output coords
      pointCount - number of valid points in the buffer
